p: The Îº-carrageenan, Tween 20 (T20) and Tween 80 (T80) were obtained from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). The orange essential oil (OEO) was purchased from the local market (dm-drogerie markt GmbH&Co KG, Brno, Czech Republic). Trehalose (Tr) was obtained from Toppotraviny.cz s.r.o. (Prague, Czech Republic).
